nodes.text: Izzet Noor was a male individual who served as the senator for Serenno in the Galactic Republic during the High Republic Era. He acted as a spokesperson for much of the Outer Rim Territories. His aide, Jeni Wataro, was secretly a spy for the marauder group known as the Nihil. Noor was unsatisfied by the hyperspace route closures in the Outer Rim imposed by Supreme Chancellor Lina Soh in the aftermath of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, and Wataro suggested that he run for the position instead.
